message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It's priced at $120, reflecting its high quality and unique features. I believe this investment will be well worth it for you.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. I think it's a great product, but I'm trying to stay within a certain budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to negotiate further. How about we settle on $100 for the product? This still reflects its value while allowing you to stay within your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I see, Bob. Thank you for your continued interest. Considering the value of our product and your budget, how about we agree on $97 for the product? This is slightly above your offer but still below my initial asking price.
I'm getting close, Alice! I'm willing to pay $96 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm glad we're closing in on an agreement. Considering the quality of our product, how about we settle on $95.50 for the transaction? This is slightly above your last offer and still below my initial asking price.
I'm really close, Alice! I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value and features of our product, how about we agree on $94.50 for the transaction? This is a fair compromise between our initial prices.
I'm really close, Alice! I'm willing to pay $94 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
